Space Seminar - Biotechnology Space Support Center

 26.03.2025 

 Download iCal file 

Add to Google Calendar

 Join us for the next Space Seminar given by Dr. Bernd Rattenbacher, who is a Manager at BIOTESC. 

 Description 

BIOTESC (
Biotechnology Space Support Center
) is a space research centre working on behalf of the
 European Space Agency 
and attached to the Lucerne University of Applied Sciences and Arts (HSLU). BIOTESC is specialized in space research and biotechnologies: On behalf of the European Space Agency, the centre offers assistance for the preparation, execution and post-flight analysis of many space experiments generally related to biotechnologies or information technologies. 

It advises scientists who intend to perform biological experiments under zero gravity conditions on board the International Space Station (ISS) in the Columbus space laboratory and supports the astronauts conducting the experiment. 

Speaker: Dr. Bernd Rattenbacher, Manager at BIOTESC

When? 26.03.2025 at 3PM 

Where? Online via MsTeams (no prior registration needed)
